key.name: app_edit_desc
key.value: Customize your Facebook App’s URLs, icon, name, and more

key.name: app_reset_desc
key.value: Return your Application’s settings to default

key.name: app_reset_failed_msg
key.value: Application reset failed. Please try again.

key.name: configuration_fields_legend
key.value: When users sign in using Facebook Connect their profile information is pulled out of Facebook. Later they can also sync their profiles. Here you need to set what info you want to sync. This works for text info only.

key.name: configuration_fields_suggest
key.value: Don't forget to review these settings whenever you change profile questions.

key.name: feed_user_join
key.value: joined our site using their Facebook account!

key.name: join_activity_string
key.value: {$user} joined our site using their Facebook account!

key.name: join_dublicate_email_msg
key.value: Sorry, looks like this email is already used

key.name: join_incomplete
key.value: Seems there are some problems with connection to Facebook. Please, try again later.

key.name: join_incorrect_username
key.value: Sorry, can't sign you in because your Facebook name contains non-latin characters ( for example $, %, ^, &, *, é, ŋ )

key.name: join_success_msg
key.value: You have successfully logged in with your Facebook account

key.name: login_success_msg
key.value: You have successfully logged in with your Facebook account

key.name: register_app_desc
key.value:
Follow these 2 simple steps to enable Facebook Connect on your site:

  • Create application and set a name for it. It should be your social network name so users remember that they signed up.
  • You will be given App ID and App Secret. Copy them to the form below and you are all set!
After that Facebook Connect will be ready to use!

key.name: register_app_failed
key.value: Application setup failed. Please check your App ID and Application Secret.

key.name: register_app_success
key.value: Facebook Connect has been successfully configured. Enjoy!
